TextView.android:text: \t\tNote: These are short descriptions of rituals commonly known in-game. Additional rituals exist but you must discover them in game. Many rituals have additional powers beyond those listed in summary!
Creates a Draconic ritual circle, identifies Draconic magic, and is a resurrection circle for Dragon followers.
1 big Magic Massive melee swing against a Blessed or Favored target, comes with a 1/ever Sense Bless.
Area of effect knockback with +15 Strength.
Minus 1 physical damage per hit for 1 hour, stacks to -5.
Like the Divine Shield battle magic, but Advanced and Ritual-level.
Replaces Mark of the Firstborn with a greater mark that offers more protection against Divine spells.
Augments your Shrine with 4 additional abilities/effects, including but not limited to the identification of Divine Magic.
Preach against the Divine for a short time to grant all who listen an Advanced Divine Shield with a short duration.
Augments a Draconic ritual circle with a small pocket dimension to store loot in, only the investees can open or close it. Non-living items only.
The caster becomes immune to most Sleep effects for 1 hour.
Extends the duration of Draconic rituals by 3 months per stack, max 12 months .
100 armour and a +0 silver threshold so long at least 1 point of it remains, can only be refit with Dragon's Hide battle magic spells.
Power Word Area, if you hear this and have a Dragon Mark you take half damage from dark/light, swing harder, and for Magic.
2 Claws that can be sheathed/unsheathed at will and swing for 5 magic.
Augments your Temple with 4 additional abilities/effects, including but not limited to expanding the boundaries of the Temple.
Hide you and your Marked followers from sight and sense, but you also cannot see or interact with the world.
Send 3 questions to your Dragon via a messenger.
Enchants a Draconic scale that allows the caster to share 1 self-cast Draconic BM spell per day with a designated Squire via touch.
Investees are stronger and swing for Magic while they are within the ritual circle.
Allows the caster to add the Ritual prefix to a single Draconic battle magic spell 1/day.
Ritual Resist a mind-affecting effect, and the respond with a penetrating dominate.
Like the battle magic spell "Dragon Fear," but Power Word Area.
Strengthens the battle magic spell "Spirit of the Firstborn".
Enchants a Draconic egg to capture your soul at the moment of death, returning it to your Draconic circle lifes you.
Augments your Temple with 4 additional abilities/effects, including but not limited to dispelling Divine battle magic and Rituals 1/day.
1/ever "Sense Bless," and for a short time your spells have the penetrating prefix against those who answer "Yes" to it.
Speak directly with an important messenger of your Dragon.
The caster and up to 2 others teleport back to their Draconic circle on a 5-count.
Creates a little Drake buddy that stores a spell and helps you with rituals.
4 big Magic Massive Stun packets that must be used in quick succession.
Investees can remotely access and use certain items stored with the Draconic circle's Hoard.
Adds 1 year to the duration of Draconic rituals.
Shortens your Draconic battle magic incants.
Turns 1/ever Draconic ritual effects into 1/day effects.
Severely weakens an Angelic creature and binds it to the material plane for a short time.
Eat gold and get body (not temp body!) that can be healed normally.
Augments your Temple with 5 additional abilities/effects, including but not limited to a shortened reset and an extra battle magic spell per day.
Summons a powerful and rare elder Drake to aid the caster for 1 hour.
For 1 hour the caster ignores Divine Magic barriers, can absorb Divine battle magic, and gains strength and temporary body from doing so.
The Hoard expands into a large pocket dimension that fills the circle and can hold living creatures within it.
So long as the caster keeps their feet planted, they may incant powerful elemental power word area attacks that also fear targets.
A powerful Arcane attack that kills Favored, Paragon, or Blessed target and severs their connection to their God for 1 hour.
Begins the process of making an exceptionally powerful Relic enchanted with Draconic magic.
Turns a Draconic ritual circle into a hoop for easy transport.
Spell Replacement: Greater Mark of the Firstborn
